greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle where row n lists the product of the factorials of the exponentials of the partitions of n and the partitions are enumerated in canonical order.
comment: By 'canonical order' we understand the graded reverse lexicographic order (the default order of Mathematica and SageMath).
program: return [product(factorial(expo) for expo in partition.to_exp()) for partition in Partitions(n)]
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Apr 10 2020
